<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dragon Handwraps](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2138)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Apex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=10" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 103 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 80,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn gloves

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Fist](/Weapons.aspx?ID=356)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These silken handwraps feature intricate embroidery of a serpentine red dragon adorned with golden thread. The handwraps function as _+3 [major striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [greater flaming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295) [handwraps of mighty blows](/Equipment.aspx?ID=441)_. You also gain a +4 item bonus to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks made to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) or [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38). When you invest the handwraps, you either increase your Strength modifier by 1 or increase it to +4, whichever is higher.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You slap the bottom of your palms with hands splayed outward, casting a 7th-level [_breathe fire_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1457) spell (DC 41).

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per hour; **Trigger** You succeed or critically succeed with a Grapple;  **Effect** You gain a +2 status bonus to your Athletics DC against any checks made to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) your grapple until the end of your next turn.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
